content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 3612022 the case went through a cost procedure in the first instance court and then moved to the supreme court the details of the case and the parties involved are not provided the final resolution of the case involves a real estate property owned by the plaintiff and defendant who are former spouses the first instance judgment divided the property with 40 going to the plaintiff and 60 to the defendant however the supreme court dismissed an application related to the case the court made a decision based on the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the main issue in the case is the payment of 7466193 eur for investments made by the defendant in the real estate the court of first instance dismissed the claims for a rehearing and determined the ownership percentages based on factors such as responsibility for the household and child income and contribution to the property value the court of second instance upheld the judgment the applicant sought leave to appeal to the supreme court on two questions but the application was dismissed the decision was unanimously adopted by the chamber

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 361/2022, 19. 10. 2022
